resources.string: 1. you can click on any item in recycler view to delete it 2.)you can save and view your favourite locations

Help: Recipe Search 

 1.) Search: Enter keywords in the search bar and tap "Search" to find recipes. 
 2.) View Details: Click on a recipe to see its ingredients and instructions. 
 3.) Save Favorites: Tap "Save" to bookmark recipes for later viewing. 
 4.) Explore Categories: Browse curated categories for inspiration. 
 5.) Get Help: Tap the menu icon and select "Help" for assistance. 
 6.) Feedback: We welcome your feedback! Contact us for support or suggestions.
